Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ducati916
Reviews.Content: i Got the power adapter right on time - it looks like the original unit, and works perfect for my DVR.

Reviews.Title: IT'S NOT 12V 5AMPS!!!
Reviews.Author: max feldt
Reviews.Content: In the description and on the pictures it says 12V 5Amps, but on my power adaptor it says the output is 12v 3000mA which equals 3amps. My DVR is rated for 12v 5amps so 3amps is not going to fly. I will see what Christina's attic

Reviews.Title: Power supply
Reviews.Author: Veronica Brown "Coffee Lover"
Reviews.Content: It was just as described in their advertising. Works very well and I have no problems with it at this time.

Reviews.Title: Dead On Arrival
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work, so back it goes. However I did notice that the 120 plug is not sized to the same specs as most US 120 plugs. The plug from the power unit to the cameras doesn't fit properly either. Very loose fitting. Very cheap product. Will not re-order.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Power supply
Reviews.Author: Dean Brendal
Reviews.Content: Product worked as advertised. We have been using it for several weeks now without any problems. Thanks for the fast service.

Reviews.Title: 12 Volt DC Power supply
Reviews.Author: ABM
Reviews.Content: I bought power supply last July 17th, today i found out its bad, not working any more, its simply sucks. Guys-- don't buy anything from this company.

ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 12 Volt 5 Amp Power Supply Power Adapter for CCTV Security Cameras (Output: DC 12V 5A)
